channel.title: [317]urgent help
channel.description:
Okay, i just download battlescape w/ client. and i try to add IPanel. i think i did all steps in right places but i get these errors
[code] lient.java:11634: package server does not exist erver.controlPanel.removeListModelItem(playerName); ^ lient.java:11682: package server does not exist erver.controlPanel.addListModelItem(playerName); ^ lient.java:12524: cannot find symbol ymbol : method stillgfx(int,int,int,int,int) ocation: class client stillgfx(id1, absY, absX, 0, 0); ^ lient.java:26693: package server does not exist erver.controlPanel.removeListModelItem(playerName); ^ ontrolPanel.java:282: non-static method getPlayerID(java.lang.String) cannot be referenced from a static context int playerID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName); ^ ontrolPanel.java:295: cannot find symbol ymbol : method getPlayerCount() ocation: class PlayerHandler int count = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); ^ ontrolPanel.java:306: non-static method getPlayerID(java.lang.String) cannot be referenced from a static context int playerID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName); ^ ontrolPanel.java:319: non-static method getPlayerID(java.lang.String) cannot be referenced from a static context int playerID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName); ^ ontrolPanel.java:335: non-static method getPlayerID(java.lang.String) cannot be referenced from a static context int playerID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName); ^ ontrolPanel.java:339: cannot find symbol ymbol : method openUpBank() ocation: class client c.openUpBank(); ^ ontrolPanel.java:346: non-static method getPlayerID(java.lang.String) cannot be referenced from a static context int playerID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName); ^ ontrolPanel.java:357: non-static method getPlayerID(java.lang.String) cannot be referenced from a static context int playerID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName); ^ ontrolPanel.java:373: non-static method getPlayerID(java.lang.String) cannot be referenced from a static context int playerID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName); ^ ontrolPanel.java:388: non-static method getPlayerID(java.lang.String) cannot be referenced from a static context int playerID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName); ^ ontrolPanel.java:394: cannot find symbol ymbol : method setAnimation(int) ocation: class client c.setAnimation(emoteID); ^ ontrolPanel.java:401: non-static method getPlayerID(java.lang.String) cannot be referenced from a static context int playerID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName); ^ ontrolPanel.java:408: deleteItem(int,int,int) in client cannot be applied to (i t,int) c.deleteItem(itemID, itemAmmount); ^ ontrolPanel.java:414: non-static method getPlayerID(java.lang.String) cannot be referenced from a static context int playerID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName); ^ ontrolPanel.java:428: non-static method getPlayerID(java.lang.String) cannot be referenced from a static context int playerID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName); ^ ontrolPanel.java:442: non-static method getPlayerID(java.lang.String) cannot be referenced from a static context int playerID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName); ^ ontrolPanel.java:474: non-static variable messageToAll cannot be referenced fro a static context PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[iPanel]: " + sendMessageText.getText( ; ^ ontrolPanel.java:482: cannot find symbol ymbol : variable updateSeconds ocation: class PlayerHandler PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = seconds + 1; ^ ontrolPanel.java:483: cannot find symbol ymbol : variable updateAnnounced ocation: class PlayerHandler PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; ^ ontrolPanel.java:484: cannot find symbol ymbol : variable updateRunning ocation: class PlayerHandler PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; ^ ontrolPanel.java:485: cannot find symbol ymbol : variable updateStartTime ocation: class PlayerHandler PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); ^ ontrolPanel.java:491: non-static method getPlayerID(java.lang.String) cannot be referenced from a static context int playerID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName); ^ ontrolPanel.java:501: cannot find symbol ymbol : variable kickNick ocation: class PlayerHandler PlayerHandler.kickNick = (String) playerList.getSelectedValue(); ^ ontrolPanel.java:506: non-static method getPlayerID(java.lang.String) cannot be referenced from a static context int playerID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName); ^ ontrolPanel.java:511: cannot find symbol ymbol : variable kickNick ocation: class PlayerHandler PlayerHandler.kickNick = playerName; ^ 9 errors ress any key to continue . . . [/code[[/code]
